snippet: Robert Griffin III, who passed for 320 yards and 2 touchdowns, became the first rookie quarterback to win an offensive player of the week award for his debut game.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Robert Griffin III of the Washington Redskins, who passed for 320 yards and 2 touchdowns in team's 40-32 victory over New Orleans Saints, becomes the first rookie quarterback to win an offensive player of the week award for his debut game; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: Robert Griffin III, who passed for 320 yards and 2 touchdowns, became the first rookie quarterback to win an offensive player of the week award for his debut game.

headline.seo: As Offensive Player of Week, Redskins’ Griffin Provides a First
headline.main: As Offensive Player of the Week, Griffin Provides a First
headline.print_headline: As Offensive Player of Week, Redskins’ Griffin Provides a First
